author: Gregor Kiczales
title: Extended Office Hours
question:
With the midterm graded, some of you may be wanting to talk with an instructor about how to interpret the results and plan your work schedule going forward.
With that in mind I'm going to extend my office hours today from 1:30 to 4:00.
